text.0: agni be kindled well with proper fuel and let the grass be scattered wide about thee.
text.1: let the impatient portals be thrown open bring thou the gods impatient to come hither.
text.2: taste agni serve the gods with our oblation offer good sacrifices jātavedas.
text.3: let jātavedas pay fair sacrifices worship andgratify the gods immortal.
text.4: wise god win for us things that are allgoodly and let the prayers we pray today be fruitful.
text.5: thee even thee the son of strength o agni those gods have made the bearer of oblations.
text.6: to thee the god may we perform our worship do thou besought grant us abundant riches.
